author: Jessica M.
text: Kaitlyn was a lifesaver! Her guidance was gentle, informative, and incredibly helpful. I went from feeling overwhelmed to confident in just one visit. Highly recommend!

author: Sarah P.
text: The virtual consultation was so convenient and effective. Kaitlyn addressed all my concerns and provided practical tips that made a huge difference. Thank you!

author: Emily R.
text: I'm so grateful for the prenatal session. It prepared me for what to expect and gave me the confidence I needed to start my breastfeeding journey on the right foot.
